original_title: 夢二 愛のとばしり
overview: Yumeji (Taro Suruga) is married to Tamaki (Tomoka Kurotani) and they have a son. Tamaki was a model for Yumeji. He makes a living by running a picture store. Due to his dissatisfaction as an artist and his own inner conflicts, he spends his days doing other things besides painting.  Meanwhile, he has lots of female fans. They are fascinated by his sexual charm. He meets Hikono (Arisa Komiya) and falls in love with her.
title: Yumeji: A Spurt of Love
